body.name: Evenflo Feeding Glass Premium Proflo Vented Plus Bottles for Baby, Infant and Newborn - Helps Reduce Colic - Clear, 8 Ounce (Pack of 6)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 27 mins
features: MOTHER NATURE APPROVED - Being environmentally kind is important to all of us which is why the Evenflo Feeding tempered glass baby bottle is recyclable, sustainable and safe for the environment.

EASY TO HOLD - Evenflo Feeding's classic and iconic shape now has a fun, ergonomic twist! These uniquely shaped vented glass baby bottles are incredibly easy to hold while feeding, ensuring both you and your little one are comfortable.

PREMIUM VENTING - Evenflo Feeding's patented Proflo Venting Technology was developed to ensure milk bubbles stay in the bottle and not in your baby's tummy. This gentle, 1-piece venting system helps significantly reduce the potential for colic, reflux, gas, and fussiness, keeping your baby comfortable even after they are finished eating.

EASY TO CLEAN - Designed with only 3 pieces, the Vented Plus Glass Baby Bottles can be easily assembled and disassembled for a quick, thorough cleaning between feedings. And because there are only a few parts, there is nothing extra to worry about misplacing. These bottles are also dishwasher safe (top rack only), making your busy life a little easier.

PUMP DIRECTLY INTO YOUR BABY BOTTLES - Breastfeeding and pumping can be a time consuming task and as a mother you have things to do. Pumping directly into your Glass Baby Bottles is convenient and our bottles will fit onto most standard neck breast pumps.
body.description: The Evenflo Feeding Vented + Glass Bottle delivers a twist on an iconic, classic design. This glass bottle is recyclable, sustainable, and Mother Nature approved. The unique, ergonomic shape is easy-to-hold, making feeding time comfortable for both you and your baby. The included Vented + Slow Flow Nipples are 100% silicone and feature built in air vents to help prevent nipple collapse. The nipple has a gradual transition between nipple length and base to allow your baby to maintain their latch. The Vented + Glass Bottles have molded measurement markers in both ounces and milliliters to provide an easy and accurate way to measure the volume of liquid. These dishwasher-safe bottles (top rack only) are compatible with all Evenflo Feeding breast pumps, as well as most other standard neck breast pump brands. The bottles and nipples are 100% free of BPA, polycarbonates, PVC and phthalates, and are also made of food-grade material.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Loved by Mother Nature Tempered glass baby bottle is recyclable, sustainable and safe for the environment.
Easy to Hold Unique twist shape is comfortable and easy to hold during feeding.

The Nipple The included Evenflo Feeding Vented + Slow Flow Nipple is 100% silicone and features an integrated 1-piece venting system to help reduce the potential for colic, reflux, gas, and fussiness. Vented + Nipples are available in the following flows: Slow, Medium* and Fast*. *Sold separately
Easy to Clean Dishwasher safe (top rack only) for convenient and quick cleaning.
Pump Compatibility Compatible with all Evenflo Feeding breast pumps and most other standard neck breast pump brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great glass bottles and easy for toddlers to hold!
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as pictured. Right off the bat they were bigger then I expected because it’s very thick glass, which I love because it won’t break as easily. Easy to wash and sanitize. It comes with the slow flowing nipples but I was able to buy fast flow nipples as well for my toddler to use for his nightly chocolate milk. The textures on the outside of the bottle also make it easy for a toddler to grip and not let it slip. Absolutely amazing bottles!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love glass bottles
reviews.reviewText: I will never use plastic bottles, they stink! These glass bottles last through many babies. I actually dropped one today on a tile floor and as it was happening I cringed knowing I just broke my first bottle, IT DID’NT BREAK! I don’t know why not, but it didn’t.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little heavy for babies to hold their own bottle, but that’s what happens with glass. Also a great quality and price compared to what’s in the market!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect bottle!
reviews.reviewText: I love that they’re glass! Can be sanitized unlike plastic! Great size for storage in cabinet. Baby drinks from it very easily! Great nipples. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more plastic
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these for 12 months now and they are fantastic. They don’t leak, they are dishwasher safe, not too heavy for my baby to use to feed herself. They’re solid and can withstand dropping onto my hardwood floors. They fit the connectors on my Medela pump and so I can pump directly into them. I usually fill them up with 5oz at a time. The price of the bigger bottles was cheaper than the pride of the smaller bottles so I went with these ones even though I don’t give such big bottles to my baby. The nipple flow that these came with has worked for my baby since birth and she continues to use the same nipples. With other brands in the past I have switched from slow flow to medium then fast flow but these ones seem to be ok just the way they are. Once we’re done with bottles, I’m planning on passing along to a friend because glass lasts! If no one wants them, I might use them as vases because they are cute in teal color and have happy memories for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but one arrived cracked
reviews.reviewText: They seem perfect for what we need-easy to clean, thick glass, good for simultaneously breastfeeding as well. Only complaint is one arrived cracked but I don’t want to deal with the hassle of returning the whole case just for one being damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality glass bottles
reviews.reviewText: We always use glass bottles for our kids. Baby #5 is 2 months old now. We've used Dr. Brown's glass for the most part, but decided to give these a try. I wish I used these from the start. The vent actually works amazing. No issues with the nipple collapsing. I was concerned about breaking them so I ordered a pack of white claw koozies for the tall bottles and red bull koozies for the short bottles. They insulate and protect from breakage and are cheap! I will likely buy another set before all is said and done. Very happy with these. They could make the numbers on the side easier to read, but that's the only con I can think of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for two years
reviews.reviewText: We loved these when I had my first son, he had colic and even Dr browns didn’t work. Slow flow nipples are great, we washed them in the dishwasher and hand washed the rings and nipples. They are also lead free!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente opción para bebes de Guardería
reviews.reviewText: Fue un gran alivio tener en stock para la guardería, ya que por ser de cristal pueden quebrarse fácilmente. El precio es muy bueno y la calidad también.
Súper fácil de lavar,transportar, y súper resistentes
excelente producto a un muy buen precio
Me encantaron las recién ido y con tapas d ella marca amarilla quedan Perfecto.
Muy buen empaque, llegaron en perfecto estado. Muy buen producto. Recomendado.
